main: ^I'm on Davao Region now at the event

c-0: ^That's great! Do you have something to ask?
^Do you know what is Mt. Apo is?
^Yes! I hiked on that 3 years ago. Here's what I know about it.
^It is known also as Apo Sandawa and is declared a protected area. A dormant volcano on the island of Mindanao. Dormant means inactive volcano.
^It is located at the southern part of the Davao and the peak of this volcano is almost 3000m or 3 kilometers above sea level.
^You are welcome, just go to me if you want to recap the info.

c-1: ^Alright, then. Let me know if you want something.
